hero.title: Passion For Coding
hero.description: Be passionate about what you do especially when you code

about.title: About us
about.description: We are an actively growing community of software developers. Passion for coding was created for gathering different people to create a good atmosphere for the education process. Our community is based in Discord. This platform is a good place to build good structure for people communications.

benefits.description2: Channels to learn, talk and have fun
benefits.description4: Amount of knowledge you can earn

roles.title: Our roles
roles.description: Community roles do not measure knowledge. They show the activity of the participant.

actions.title: What you can do here
actions.action1Description: Post a vacancy in the #vacancies channel. In the #projects channel, place your project and find volunteers to help you with.
actions.action2Description: Have lots of interesting activities for yourself. Humor, education, amazing events, and more other things.
actions.action3Description: Besides learning and improving yourself, you can also help others. Place an article and help our community learn something new.
